overview: A collection of images recorded during the tour of 2006 - 2007 the dates of Rome (19-20 / 12/06), Genoa (19/04/07), Milan (04/21/07), Roma (24/04 / 07), Caserta (03.04.07). Tracklist: Sinfonietta (prologue); All here; Along the way; We do not; You will; Medley je je; Porta Portese; My way; Ms. Lia; W England; Nights; Serenade in G; Ever more like you; Loves being; Posters; Medley atmospheric; With all the love that I can; I from the sea; Girls from the East; Those two; Tomorrow never; Water from the moon; How many times; It's me; Good luck; Medley folk; Country girl; The old; A little 'more; Photographs; Live; The streets of the colors; Heart glider; Now advertising; Night of notes, notes of night; Medley rock; By the way; A new day and a new day; I would go; What you want; Bolero; Great man; Keep me with you; Via; Medley song; This little big love; Beautiful love; And you; Saturday afternoon; Only; And how are you; I am here; One thousand days of you and me; Life is now.
title: Claudio Baglioni - Tutti Qui Tour 2006-2007
